title: Silver 3+ For Ranked 5 Team
body: Our ranked 5s team has 3 people that are from Silver 3 to Gold 4 in rank. We have a Support main, ADC main and Mid laner main. Currently, we are in search of a Top laner and Jungler that are available most days in the week. If you wish apply for this role please add either Toot Toot or myself or reply to this thread exactly and we will go from there.

replies.body: Also added you so accept when you can and we will start to form the team.
gold 4, top/jung player i wanted to start playing ranked teams
I've added you so accept when you can and we will see what's going to happen.
